div.p: Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxv die octobris anno quo supra

the samyn day patrik rede grantit him awand' to Jonhne portar x s' of Siluer
the quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

the samyn day Jonhne gilespy grantit that gayfer portar of brugis hede ane
quartar of ane schip callit the cristofer and deneyit that euir he knew that Androw
branche hede ony part of the saide schip quharfor the saide Androw protestit
quhat costis and skathis he sustenit tharthrow he may recouere apon' the saide
Johnhe witnes James cuminge Dauid mathesone Dauid mar' thomas chamer
William vmfray Jonhne fechat Williame cuminge and Androw fyf

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod Dauid baxtar est legittimus et propinquior
heres quondam Johannis baxtar patris suj Et prepositus ac consilij dederunt
thome fyf balliuo in mandatis ad cognoscendum dictum Dauid ad terras
suas in decet filium et heredem burgensis cognosci videlicet ad terram sibi Juri hereditario
contingen' inter terram Jacobi Kintor ex australi et terram Johannis stevinson' ex boreali in vico
furcarum

the samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' Jonhne colisone
forspekar that Jonhne gilespy is quyt of the fraucht of ane auchtan part
of the schip callit cristofer follouit be Androw branche quhilkis he allegit
he hed' of gayfer

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Jonhne' colisone forspekar
that thome of chamer tailyour sal pay to patrik wys' his hors' hyer'
and the skath of his hors' that is hurt and spilt in his defalt

the samyn day Jonhne lilburne was fundin quyt be ane assis' of the
clame of the fraucht of demi pety quartar of Salt and ij li' follouit be
murthow glenmaluyn
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxviij die octobris Anno quo supra

the samyn day the borghe' strekit apone James Kennarty eldar
be thomas prat for the wranguis' haldin fra him of vj li' for
franche clath was fundin of nane awale and the saide James quyt
of his challance be the moutht of James cuming forspekar of the assis'

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' William blinsele forspekar
that Wat atkin is awand' xxi quhit extending' to xxxi d' scottis to
Androw Waus of the rest of his compt and rekning of his billis send' in Danskin
and the saide Androw sal haf v barrelis of mele and pay the fracht of tham and iiij barrelis or resavit

the samyn day the balyeis assignit tuysday at next cumis to William
sprvnt to ansuer to the borghe strekit apone him be Jonhne andirson'
for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xviij s'

the samyn day the aldirman and balyeis assignit tuysday that next
cumis to alexander sanquhar' to preyf the xl s' clamit be Jonhne
fechat pait

Curia legalis burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio secundo die Novembris
anno quosupra

the samyn day the actione dependand' betuix mathow culan and Androw
culane his assignay one that ane part Ande agnes club one that vthir
part for waknes of the court is continevit quhile monunday that next
cumis in sic strintht force and effect as obefor but preiudice tile ony part

the samyn day Alexander sanquhar oft tymes callit be philp Dunbrek
officiar' and nocht comperit to preyf the xl s' pait that Jonhne fechat clamit
him quhilk day was assignit to him to the saide preyf In the quhilk
preif the saide alexander falyeit

the saide day huchone tode tuk to preyf one friday that next cumis that
the boll taile and vthir smale taile fundin with him was gevin him be
Androw Watsone
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio quinto die nouembris anno quosupra

the samyn day Androw Watsone deponit the gret aithe that he gaf to huchon'
tode the taile that he was slanderit with

The saide day the balyeis assignit monunday that next cumis to Androw
Waus to ansuer tile the borghe strekit apone him be Dauid spens for
the wranguis' haldin fra him of the fraucht of v barrellis of meile

the samyn day Dauid prat eldar follouit thomas Wodman for the wranguis'
stribulance of his modir and the said thomas was maid quyt of the said
stribulance be ane suorne assis' Williame portar talisman of the samyn

Eodem die Dauid prat Junior inuenit Dauid prat seniorem plegium legalem quod
thomas Wodman et pars sua erunt Indempnes pro eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam
Juris Et Idem thomas inuenit Andream louson plegium legalem quod dictus Dauid et pars
sua erunt Indempnes pro eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris

the saide day Jonhne colisone one that ane part and Williame carnequyn
one that vthir part ar' oblist be the fathtis of thar bodiis to stande ande
abide at the deliuerance decret and ordinance of thar personis vndir
writin that is to say Robert blinsele Wat auchneywe alexander angoson
Androw murray and William nicholson' chosin be the saide partiis anent
tene markis clamit be the saide Jonhne apon' the said William eftir
the tenor' of the borghe strekit tharapon' quhilkis partiis sal comper
one the morne eftir Sanct nicholes day and quhay that falyeis and
comperis nocht but ane lauchfull exces' sall tyne thar caus'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem octauo die no
uembris

the samyn day William lammynton grantit him avand' to Jonhne West
lande iij hidis and vj s' quhilkis the balyeis chargit him pay within terme
of law

the samyn day Androw lammynton oblist him be his hand and fatht of his
bodie to pay to sere Dauid Waus vicar' of banf xviij s' at sanct
nicholes day next to cum And gyf he falyeis to pay the saide some
and viij s' vnforgewin to Sanct nicholes licht

the saide day Williame portar come souerte be his handis landis and
gudis to kep sere Dauid Waus skathles anent Androw baxtaris
charteris quhilkis he hede in kepin' and deliuerit tham to Anny baxtar

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod Agnes gyffard est
legittima et propinquior heres quondam Willelmi gyffard patris suj

Eodem die Andreas branche inuenit alexandrum rede plegium legalem quod
thomas fyf and pars sua erunt Indempnes pro eo aliter quam per viam
Juris Et Idem thomas inuenit Willelmum Kintor plegium legalem quod dictus
Andreas et pars sua erunt Indempnes pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris
et quelibet earundem parcium obligatur ad conseruandum plegios suos Inde
mpnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

the samyn day Jonhne Kintor oft tymes callit and nocht comperit to
ansuer tile the borghe' strekit apon him be Jonhne fechat for
the wranguis' haldin fra him of xv dalis of hevin treis
quharfor the balyeis chargit androw nachty officiar' to pas' and
tak ane stres' and lat it to borghe gif it be askit and warne him
to this day xv dais

the action betuix mathow Culane and Androw culan his assignay one that
ane part Ande Agnes clubane one that vthir part the samyn day
was continewit be the balyeis quhile monunday that next to cum in sic
strintht and effect obefore but preiudice tile ony party for waknes

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
eiusdem xv die mensis nouembris Anno quo supra

the samyn day alexander pettindreiche was in ane Amerciament
of the court be his avne tonge gravnt for the wranguis'
stribulance of murtho glenmaluyn and to amende as law will
and forbeir' in tyme to cum

Eodem die alexander petindreiche inuenit alexandrum rede plegium legalem
quod murthaicus glenmaluyn et pars sua erunt Indempnes pro eo et parte
sua aliter quos per viam iuris Et alexander chamer deuenit plegius le
galis quod dictus alexander petindreiche et pars sua erunt Indempnes
pro eo et parte aliter quam per viam Juris

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Jonhne colison talisman
that Androw chamer is quyt of the stribulance of thomas mar' balye
and of androu lammynton' Ande the said Androw lammynton' in ane amerciament
of the court for the wranguis' rehers' making' apon the said Androw
chamer and for the strubulance of him in his hews' seruice doing'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xix die
nouembris Anno quo supra

the samyn day the balyeis assignit monunday
that next cumis to Wat atkin to ansuer til the borghe strekit apon
him be Dauid spens for the wranguis' haldin fra him of v li' x s'
and a franche crovne tharof pait j barrel ry meile and xiij d' to be pait
within xxiiij houris ande to set Souerte to pay him vthir v li' and x s'
at candilmes and pasche for the thridpart of ane schip callit the Katerin'
And' forthir to ansuer' for the wranguis' haldin fra him of vj li' iij s'
and iiij d' contenit in ane decret gevin be certane personis chosin betuixe
tham tharapon'

The xv day of June the yer' of god jM iiijc and lxxxx yeris It was
deliuerit be a gret assis' that mathow culane aucht to haue the haile
airschip of al gudis that his brothir vmquhil thomas culan hed and was
possessit of the tym of his deces' and ordanis mathow culan to bringe his preyfis
tharapone befor the aldirman and balyeis Ande in safar as can' be fundin' be
suorne men' unsuspek that the lande in the gastraw now breukit be agnes
club be reson of coniunctfeftment is distroit and maide war' sene the saide
thomas deces' in the saide agnes clubis defalt that scho sal amend' it and
mak it als' gude and the lawe of hir coniunctfeftment to be distrenyet tharfor
Extractus per me Andream cadiow clericum Curie pro tempore teste manum propria

the samyn day the aldirman chargit the balyeis to do Justice ande
putt the ake deliuerit be the gret assis' befor the chavmerlane anent the
lande of vmquhile thomas culan' liand' in the gastraw and anent the
airschip clamyt be mathow culan and Androw culane his assignay tile exe
cucion as accordis thame of law

the samyn day sere Jonhne ruthirfurde aldirman complenyet to the balyeis
that Anny strathachin the wyf of Wille buchane hede wrang
uislie and agannis the law maide senestir ewill and fals' relacion apon'
him and askit tham to sende thar officiar' for hir that he mycht haue remede
of law And' thai as accordit tham of thar office Sende Androw nachty
seriand to the saide Agnes and charge hir to comper befor tham for tile vndirly
the law quhilk seriand personalie comprehendit hir and chargit hir in the kingis
name and the balyeis to cum to the tolbutht to ansuer as law will for the
saide ewile relacion and scho ansuerd that scho hede nane erand' thar and wald
nocht cum And' thareftir the balyeis ordanit philp Dunbrek seriand' to pas' and warne
hir to comper befor tham on' monunday next to cum to ansuer to the said wrangis

the samyn day thomas prat allegit him tutour testamentale to Anny torre leithe
and scho was passit fra him quharfor he protestit Solemptlie quhat
the saide Agnes happinnis to do but his consent turne to nay preiuduce

The samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' alexander rede forspekar
that Syme gardin sal pay j bonat Jonhne fechat / Ande gif the
saide Jonhne cane preyf that the saide Symon' putt the saide Jonhne out
of his hous' befor the terme than the saide Symon' sal pay him the
the saide hous' maile And' the saide Symon' is quyt of al vthir
clamis follouit be the saide Jonhne

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio xxij die Nouembris
anno quo supra

the samyn day alexander Jonhnestone of that Ilk fande Jonhne Waus
Souerte to keip Richerde hill skathtles anent j barrel of tar j cowntoure
and wthir geir' for Androw goldsmitht

the samyn day alexander Jonhnestone of that Ilk grantit and saide that he sulde bringe the
suerde clamit be William Wormet be fasterinewin' and deliueritit to him Ande falye
ing tharof he sall bringe the man that he gat the suerde fra at the saide terme
and entir him in the tolbutht befor the aldirman and balyeis

the samyne day Jonhne Waus comperit befor the aldirman and balyeis
ande schew ane assedacion of ane croft sett to him be Jonhne of Kintor
and protestit gyf ony persone schup thame to occupy or mannuyr the
saide croft suld' turne him to nay preiudice

the samyn day the borghe' strekit be Jonhne fechat apone Jonhne Kintor
for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xv dalis of hevin treis is continevit
be ane assis' quhill friday cum xv dais and that day the partiis sal bringe
thar witnes and documentis as day of peremptour deliuerit be ane assis'

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' alexander rede forspekar that
Wat atkin was in Amerciament of the court for the wranguis' haldin fra
Dauid spens of vj li' and xl d' vsusale money of Scotlande

The samyn day Dauid baxtar sone and ayr to vmquhile Jonhne baxtar comperit
and schew he hede nay thinge to lywe apone and he behuffit to Sell his
lande quharfor he perofferit his lande to Sell to ony of his nerrast
kyne and frendis gif ony walde by it and gif him competent price
to his sustenacion for the samyn
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxvj die nouembris anno quo supra

the samyn day Duncane straloche oblist him to entir Androw Kymdy
befor the aldirman and balyeis in the tolbutht one the law day next eftir
yule to ansuer' to William simson for iiij s' Ande gif the saide
Duncan entiris nocht the saide Androu the forsaide day than the saide
Duncan is dettour for the saide iiij s'

the samyn day William sprwnt comperit befor the aldirman and balyeis and offerit
him redy to vndirly the law befor thame as his Juge ordinar anent ale
thingis that Jonhne andirsone hede to say to him or follow him fore

the samyn day Williame sprvnt was fundin awand' to Jonhne
andirsone xiij s' and iiij d' vsuale money of Scotlande

the saide day alexander allansone seriande at commawnde of the balyeis char
git be his wande Williame nicholsone to remane within the tolbutht quhill
he pait xlvi s' and ix d' to george of Cornton' optenit apon him
obefor

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio penultimo die
Nouembris anno quo supra

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem
quod Dauid baxtar filius et heres quondam Johannis baxtar excessit
annos tutorie et non restat sub aliquo tutore et est legittime etatis
et facultatis ad vendendum et alienandum terras suas et hoc de fide
dignorum testimonio Insuper dictus Dauid fatebatur se quedam contractum
cum venerabili viro magistro alexandro Waus canonico abirdonensis ac preben
dario de turray fecisse de et super vendicione et alienacione
Cuiusdam terre burgagie Jacentis infra dictum in vico furcarum ex occidentali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram Jacobi Kintor ex australi ex vna
et terram Johannis stewinsone ex boreali partibus ex altera et corporale
Juramentum prestitit ad conseruandum fideliter huiusmodi contractum et nunquam contra
eundem clam uel palam deuenire nec reuocare et sub penis
periurij et infamie ac ypotheca et obligacione omnium terrarum et bonorum
suorum et si reuocare in postrum contigerit demo omniam premissa appro
bat et ratificat tociens quociens omnibus fraude et dolo
Semotis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio tercio die
Decembris Anno quo supra

The samyn day Androw murray eldar grantit
that he sulde vndirly the deliuerance and ordinance of the consale anent
the martymes maile of ane Sext part of the croyftis clamit be the aldirman
and the balyeis chargit the saide Androw to comper befor tham one friday
that next cumis and thai suld' warne the consal to comper' the saide day

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio ix die Decembris
anno quosupra

Eodem die matheus stane fecit constituit creauit et
nominauit Richardum Waus et thomam chapman coniunctim et divisim
suos legittimos procuratores actores factores ac deputatos speciales et generales
cum potestate subsciendi sub se et aliquo ipsorum vnum et plures ad presentandum
breue capelle regis preposito et ballivis et Idem debite proclamari et deser
uiri per ipsum Impetratum penes peticionem et clameum Juris hereditarij
bonorum quondam magistri thome stane sibi contingen' et omnia bona
sua petend' exigend' et recipiend' et de receptis acquitand' ac in
omnibus aliis siue actionibus querelis et causis ipsum concernentibus in vbe
riore forma procuratorij promitten' de Rato et grato cum omnibus aliis
clausulis ad huiusmodi procuratorium necessariis et oportunis

the samyn day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday Sanct thomas
evin to alexander mar to ansuer to the burghe' strekit in the handis of alexander
allanson' seriande be Androw andirson' for the wranguis' takin out of
certan gudis out of his chamer quhilkis ar wranguslie Intromettit with be
the said alexander and aucht to restoir' tham agan' et cetera as law will and distre
nit the copy of the borghe' to the saide alexander

Burgenses et fratres gilde tempore prepositure domini Johannis
ruthirfurde militis de tarlane militis

Johannes' Williamsone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Juramento et Solut' xx s' quod remittitur ad instanciam domini Alexandri gordon'

Willelmus buchane Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et
fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento et Solut' quinque s' in alba
bursa

Walterus paterson recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito
Solito Juramento et Solut' xiij s' et iiij d'

Dauid leis carpentarius ad Instanciam domini nostri Episcopi Abirdonensis
recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento

Richardus Jonhnesone in lindrum recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde Solut' xx s'

Johannes Kintor Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Juramento et Solut' quinque s' in alba bursa

Andreas baxtar in slanis ad requestum domini Willelmi muresone
recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento

Johannes Williamsone textor recipitur in liberum burgensem Soluto quinque s'
in alba bursa et prestito Solito Juramento et hoc Jure paternitatis

Dominus Johannes stirueling gracia prepositi et consilium recipitur in liberum burgensem
et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento sed secum dispensetur de lott scott wak and warde
Dominus Willelmus mureson' recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ut supra

Richardus Watsone prope Culan morans recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito
solito Juramento et Solut'
Alexander hay in fordys' recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde solut' xx s' et prestito solito Juramento

Johannes mar' filius heres thome mar' recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Jure paternitatis
Solut' quinque s' in alba bursa et prestito Solito Juramento

Marcus Scot gracia prepositi et diuersorum consilij recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde Solut' quinque s' in alba bursa et prestito Solito Juramento
